bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXXV (Nos 2733-2744)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Lobel E., The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXXV (Nos 2733-2744). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 50.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1968, 8Â°, xii-116 pp. et XII pll.

C.R. par Zbigniew Borkowski, JJurP 18 (1974) pp. 263-264. - LLoyd W. Daly, AJP 93 (1972) pp. 374-377 - Jean Irigoin, REG 82 (1969) pp. 630-632. - Wolfgang Luppe, Gnomon 43 (1971) pp. 113-123. - Paul Mertens, BibO 27 (1970) pp. 355-356. - Ors. Montevecchi, Aegyptus 48 (1968) pp. 252-256 (concerne aussi les volumes XXXII et XXXIV). - J. Pegueroles, StPap 9 (1970) p. 125.
